item.title: NOS Hackathon IoT by Hardware City
item.description: NOS Hackathon IoT by Hardware City 13 de Abril de 2019 - 15 de Abril de 2019 Incubadora OPEN Descri√ß√£o: O NOS Hackathon IoT √© uma maratona de tecnologia focada em IoT, onde vais resolver desafios reais da NOS e dos seus clientes. Durante 3 dias vais ter ajuda de mentores experientes e workshops pr√°ticos que te v√£o ajudar a desenvolver provas de conceito inovadoras. Se te interessas por IoT, design de produto e se gostas de hardware ou software, este evento √© para ti.

item.title: Hardware City: Session 10
item.description: Hardware City Session #10 | Product Development in Portugal Hardware City Session #10 | Product Development in Portugal Quarta-feira, 28 de mar√ßo de 2018, 20h30 Centro Cultural e de Congressos de Aveiro Descri√ß√£o: [PT|EN] A HARDWARE CITY SESSION#10 chegou! item.description: Hardware City Session #9 | Product Development - Design Edition Hardware City Session #9 | Product Development - Design Edition Ter√ßa-feira, 27 de fevereiro de 2018 Centro Cultural e de Congressos de Aveiro Descri√ß√£o: [PT|EN] A terceira temporada das HARDWARE CITY SESSIONS continua! O tema da Session#9 ser√° no √¢mbito de Desenvolvimento de Produto, com oradores que aliam o design √† engenharia para criar produtos tecnol√≥gicos e inovadores. item.title: Hardware City: Session 8
item.description: Hardware City Session #8 | Product Development in Portugal Hardware City Session #8 | Product Development in Portugal Quarta-feira, 31 de janeiro de 2018, 20h30 Centro Cultural e de Congressos de Aveiro Descri√ß√£o: [PT|EN] Na HARDWARE CITY vamos abrir o ano em grande com o in√≠cio de uma nova temporada das nossas Sessions. A Session #8 vai ser sobre Desenvolvimento de Produto em Portugal e fizemos quest√£o de convidar os melhores oradores para voc√™s!

item.title: Hardware City: Sunset Hackathon 2017
item.description: Sunset Hackathon 2017 Sunset Hackathon 2017 01 de setembro de 2017 - 03 de setembro de 2017 Cais criativo da Costa Nova Descri√ß√£o: O Primeiro Sunset Hackathon chega a Portugal! Dias 1, 2 e 3 de setembro, o Hardware City organiza uma maratona tecnol√≥gica de 72 horas focada na cria√ß√£o de solu√ß√µes inovadoras que re√∫ne talentos e empresas num contexto descontra√≠do e de Ver√£o - e tu n√£o podes faltar!

item.title: Hardware City: Session 7
item.description: Hardware City Session #7 Hardware City Session #7 Ter√ßa-feira, 28 de mar√ßo de 2017, 20h45 Centro Cultural e de Congressos Descri√ß√£o: We’re back again and with another awesome session! This time, we wanted to do something really special, so we decided to create a panel full of women! Yeah, we know that this kind of area can be dominated by men, but we also know that even though women are not the minority, they can do it better - or at least as well as men do - don’t kick us!

item.title: Hardware City: Session 6
item.description: Hardware City Session #6 Hardware City Session #6 Quarta-feira, 22 de fevereiro de 2017, 20h45 Centro Cultural e de Congressos de Aveiro Descri√ß√£o: HARDWARE CITY is back for yet another great year. We‚Äôre kicking off 2017 with Session #6 and let us tell you, you‚Äôre in for a treat! In this Session we will talk about the Interception between Agriculture and Technology, or AgTech. We‚Äôve invited some of the hottest startups in Portugal to share their vision about the present and future of agriculture.

item.title: Hardware City: Session 5
item.description: Hardware City Session #5 Hardware City Session #5 Ter√ßa-feira, 12 de julho de 2016, 20h45 Centro Cultural e de Congressos de Aveiro Descri√ß√£o: Session #5 will be all about Industry 4.0! We’ve gathered some of the top experts in IoT, Hardware Development and Industrial optimization processes. We’ve also prepared a great debate session and live showcases from Startups, Makers and Research entities! We hope you’ll enjoy it. Speakers: Francisco Almada Lobo - CEO @ Critical Manufacturing Celso Martinho - CEO @ BrightPixel Miguel Santos - Director of Product Development @ Bosch Stay tuned for more updates!

item.title: Hardware City: Session 4
item.description: Hardware City Session #4 Hardware City Session #4 Ter√ßa-feira, 31 de maio de 2016, 20h45 Centro Cultural e de Congressos de Aveiro Descri√ß√£o: The next HARDWARE CITY SESSION edition will be held within the EUROPEAN MAKER WEEK. You can register for free here: http://events.europeanmakerweek.eu/events/view/464 We are preparing something Huge for you! This time around, the discussion will focus on the Maker Community and FabLabs. For that purpose we will be featuring 4 Great Guests explaining the concept, and talking about how to take advantage of Fablabs.

item.title: Hardware City: Session 3
item.description: Hardware City Session #3 Hardware City Session #3 Quarta, 27 abril, de 2016, 21h Centro Cultural e de Congressos de Aveiro Descri√ß√£o: We are happy to announce the HARDWARE CITY Session #3! After a crowded and sometimes messy second session, we are announcing an HARDWARE CITY Session with new facilities, equipment and more prepared to receive you! We will bring to you three guests and this time, a pitch of a new product from a maker!

item.title: Hardware City: Session 2
item.description: Hardware City Session #2 Hardware City Session #2 Quarta, 30 de mar√ßo de 2016, 21h Olaria Bar Aveiro Descri√ß√£o We are happy to announce the HARDWARE CITY Session #2! After a great kick-off, we are planning a new, even more ambitious, HARDWARE CITY Session! We went out of our way to bring you three awesome guests, that will share their experience, vision and know-how. We hope you enjoy this session!

item.title: Hardware City: Session 1
item.description: Hardware City Session #1 Hardware City Session #1 Quarta, 24 de fevereiro de 2016, 20h30 Ol√° Ria Restaurante Descri√ß√£o: As Hardware City Sessions s√£o encontros informais para discutir o processo de cria√ß√£o de um produto desde o seu desenvolvimento, passando pela industrializa√ß√£o e at√© √† sua comercializa√ß√£o. Em cada Hardware City Session, convidados ligados a este setor d√£o o mote √† discuss√£o, com uma breve talk seguida de um momento de perguntas e respostas.
